data.title: CCSprite::createNode bug fix.
data.body:
This bug is to occur in a particular model data.
When you call the "Sprite3D::createNode" to children of node generation, pointer of the parent node is null.

This is test data.
[test_create_child_node_bug.zip](https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/files/254450/test_create_child_node_bug.zip)

data.title: Prevent variable shadowing warnings
data.body:
This commit prevents two warnings caused by variable shadowing on Xcode 7.3 since commit 9ff61f915ca1e9342114918a898b78655d6369a2 :

```
cocos/base/ccUtils.cpp:348:14: Declaration shadows a local variable
cocos/base/ccUtils.cpp:370:14: Declaration shadows a local variable
```

data.title: add missing lua const values
data.body: Some ScrollViewEvent values are missing for lua bindings.

data.title: Add cc.game.end to close game window
webp not support for winrt project
Package name is `libcocos2dx` if building with Android Studio
data.body:
如下图所示，安卓手机上，安装包的显示名字是 “libcocos2dx” 而不是应用名称
[错误的包名字截图](http://ww3.sinaimg.cn/large/a8c38b53gw1f3ml2ojgs8j20dc0nqdhu.jpg)

其实修正相当简单：
- 找到 Android Studio 工程的  App 的 [AndroidManifest.xml](https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/blob/v3/templates/cpp-template-default/proj.android-studio/app/AndroidManifest.xml) 文件，为 `<application>` 标签添加一个子属性  `android:label="@string/app_name"`
- 找到 cocos2d 的 [AndroidManifest.xml](https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/blob/v3/cocos/platform/android/libcocos2dx/AndroidManifest.xml)  文件，删掉 `<application>` 标签里的子属性   `android:label="libcocos2dx"`  

就搞定了。

data.title: update bindings-generator to fix compiling issues on ubuntu 16.04
Suppress warning C4800 on MSVC
data.body:
This patch fixes MSVC warning [C4800](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/b6801kcy.aspx) about forcing integer value to bool with Visual Studio 2015:

```
cocos\physics\CCPhysicsBody.cpp(758): warning C4800: 'cpBool' : forcing value to bool 'true' or 'false' (performance warning)
```

data.title: Use clang toolchain for Android
data.body:
From http://developer.android.com/ndk/downloads/revision_history.html (history of r11)

> Clang
> Important announcements
> We strongly recommend switching to Clang.
> 
> GCC
> Important announcements
> GCC in the NDK is now deprecated in favor of Clang.

Works to do:
- choose `clang` toolchain in `cocos console`, refer to [this PR](https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-console/pull/342)
- use `clang toolchain` to build 3rd party libraries of Android platform: #15781

data.title: Prevent memory leak: force drain on autoreleased `data`.
data.body:
Based on discussion: http://discuss.cocos2d-x.org/t/capturescreen-memory-leak/29108/
`@autoreleasepool block` supposedly requires ARC, but seems to work with or without ARC on OS X 10.7+ and iOS 5.0+.
It is currently being used already in HttpClient-apple.mm.

data.title: remove studio related test cases and resources
Quality low on iOS but Android (v. 3.10)
data.body:
Recently we found that the same app run on **iOS** and Android can result slight difference in quality.
The quality(images, labels) is better on **Android**.
For what comes to my mind in the first time, I thought of **retina** may not enabled on **iOS**, but with some time of research on the internet, it looked like **Cocos2d-x** now automatically enable **retina** for **iOS** now. 
Furthermore, it seems that labels is more blurred if run on **iOS**, this make me think that it is definitely not the "-hd" resources missing for **retina-use**.
Is there any config or setting to adjust something quality-related? I've tried _CEAGLView_ pixel format but with no luck.

Hope to see your response and support soon! 
Thanks in advance!

---

btw, if **Cocos2d-x** now turn on retina automatically, why the main.js still exist a code like :

> ```
> cc.view.enableRetina(true);
> ```

data.title: utils::captureScreen memory leak
data.body:
Hi there!

I've been using the captureScreen command lately like this

```
utils::captureScreen(CC_CALLBACK_2(MenuGameLayer::afterCaptured, this), "capturescreen.png");
```

but I constantly have a memory leak which can increase the memory usage quite heavily if I take too many screenshots. (using xCode, iOS 9)

If I go into onCaptureScreen in ccUtils.cpp and return immediately like this

```
void onCaptureScreen(const std::function<void(bool, const std::string&)>& afterCaptured, const std::string& filename)
{
    return;
    ...
}
```

the leak does not occur. 

Any help? 

Davide
